entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
